text: Hi there! I'm excited to learn more about you for our podcast. Let's start with the basics - what's your name?
Great to meet you! What's the best email address to reach you at?
Perfect! Now, tell me a bit about yourself. What's your background and what do you do? (Think of this as your elevator pitch!)
That sounds fascinating! What are your main areas of expertise? Feel free to list multiple areas separated by commas.
Excellent! What specific topics would you be most excited to discuss on the podcast? This helps me prepare great questions for our conversation.
Awesome! Do you have any social media profiles or websites you'd like to share? (LinkedIn, Twitter, personal website, etc.)
Almost done! What's your availability like? Any preferred days/times, or any periods when you're not available?
